1.content: What are you? Are you a human? A fairy? Something else entirely?
1.title: Man or Myth?

11.content: Ah! I see, you are a fairy, then. What gender are you, then? It will help me determine how best to advertise you.
11.title: Gender

111.content:
Jasper worries. Male fairies are generally not wanted. Males can be used for breeding or there are those truly sick humans that love to torture males but other than that, practically no one wants a male fairy. In fact, fairy dealers habitually murder three out of every four male fairies to keep from having too many of the kind of fairies no one wants.

Jasper though is no ordinary male fairy. First, his magic is of the beautifying variety. If you've grown tired of how your fairy looks, take her to Jasper and he can turn your blonde into a brunette or your pixie into a buxom babe.

Second, Jasper has connections with the fairy underground. The fairy underground is a secret organization that attempts to improve the lives of fairies. It is mostly escaped males and they are practically powerless. They only intervene in the most severe cases of fairy abuse because rescuing a fairy from non-abusive, sexual slavery is a waste of time and would lead to too much loss of life. The fairy under ground has adopted the motto that sex is better than death.

However, it is Jasper's connections that brings him here. He is bent over with one leg on a step because he knows this display will attract the human he hopes will buy him. He has spent the last year secretly spying on humans to find a kind, non-abusive master. Then he risked joining the fairies of this slave dealer for the chance to be sold to his chosen master. He risked being killed by the slave dealer and now he risks being sold to the wrong master but such is the life of a fairy. Jasper uses his magic on himself to make himself attractive to the master he chooses.

Does his plan succeed?
111.title: Jasper

1111.content:
A cruel man picks up Jasper. His hands are rough. He asks, "How much for this runt?"

The fairy dealer says, "Just a quarter but I have too many males right now. I'll let you have a hundred males for a dollar."

"Deal." The cruel man sets Jasper down and fishes for his wallet. Jasper takes the opportunity to sneak off and hide. Several male fairies don't bother hiding because they have no hope. Jasper wishes there was something he could do but all he could do would lead him to be one of those doomed fairies. As soon as the cruel man pays for them, he pops a few down his throat and walks off.

Then his chosen master comes closer to the fairy dealer so Jasper comes out of hiding to display himself. Who is his chosen master.
1111.title: A narrow escape

choices: A Haughty Highschool Girl (Potentially a Cheerleader)
112.content:
Tanya, a petite short-haired brunette fairy, was nervous. Having to put herself on display for potential buyers tended to do that to the young fairy. She was stark naked, her small breasts jiggling ever so slightly as she anxiously strutted about to showcase her assets for the benefit of the customer and at the command of the shop owner. It was a tried and true sales tactic in the fairy trade, and Old Job, the manager of this small Fairy ShoppeTM had plenty of experience in making fairies do what they were told.

          "This one is particularly nice," Job said, indicating a fairly plump and busty dark-skinned fairy named Tia who was at the far end of the display case, "She is already fattened up and is very eager to please. In fact, for a paltry twenty dollars I'll even throw in a jar of fairy dust seasoning (a secret family recipe) and a second fairy of your choosing!"

          On cue, Tanya and a dozen other fairy lasses turned around, bent over, and splayed their legs to entice the prospective buyer. This was the routine taught to them from the moment their wings were clipped. Those who failed to do as they were instructed tended to end up as free samples of live snack cracker toppings.

          "Okay," came the voice of the customer, "I think I'll take that one."

          Tanya felt a shiver go down her spine, and she realized, with growing dread, that it was SHE who the had been chosen. Slowly turning around, with a fearful flinch she looked into the face of her new master....
112.title: Meet Tanya

1122.content:
Tanya gazed into the blue eyes of her new master, a buxom miniskirt-wearing blonde who couldn't have been any older than sixteen. The girl's eyes held no kindness toward Tanya -- the terrified fairy could tell that much with ease.

The odds of her surviving for more than a week were slim at best, especially since she was being given away as a free bonus with a purebred voraephile like Tia, who was in particular bred specifically to ultimately end up on a dinner plate. While she was fretting and worrying, the wizened manager plucked her up and stuck her in a mason jar next to an enthusiastic Tia. Their jar was then put into a shopping bag, and their blonde mistress took them them away.

...

When Tanya and Tia's jar was finally removed from the shopping bag, it was in the kitchen of their mistress's home.

"Hey, mom!" their buxom owner hollered, "Where's the bread? I wanna make a sandwich before going out."

"Oh, Elizabeth, don't tell me you're gonna waste that fairy on sandwich!" The girl's mother hollered back at her daughter from upstairs.

"I bought it with my own money!" Eliza replied, "I can eat it however I want!"

"Fine! The bread's in the cupboard!"

"I already looked there!'

"It's next to the jerky! I put it there last--"

"Never mind, I found it!"

Elizabeth opened the bag and took out two slices of bread. Then she opened the jar she had bought from the store and pulled out...
1122.title: Like, Faeburgh High Forever!

choices: Elizabeth eats the sandwich then and there.
Elizabeth puts it in her lunch box and saves it for later.
11222.content:
Tanya, with a sense of growing dread, realized that the hand was coming for her. She whimpered, feeling tears come to her eyes, as the blonde's hand clenched about her just a bit more tightly than was comfortable.

She was lifted up out of the jar. Seeing the remorseless blue eyes of the one holding her, she glared defiantly.

Elizabeth did not seem to notice this, however. Without a second thought, she slapped Tanya in between two slices of white bread along with a slice of swiss cheese. The cheese covered the front of Tanya's body. The slice of dairy was cold, having been taken right out of the fridge, and Tanya whimpered in reluctant arousal as felt her nipples harden a press more tightly against it.

Tanya was now no more than the meat in a schoolgirl's sandwich.
11222.title: Tanya

choices: An Indian Woman in her twenties
1123.title: Other

12.content: Ah, a human. You must be one of my customers. Now, pardon my asking, but are you a man or a woman? These old eyes aren't what they used to be.
12.title: Master of All

123.content: All right Now what your name? Speak up I have bad hearing.
123.title: Boy

choices: a young fairy with a depressed look
1231.content:
"Azure I called asking if you had any Fairys you wanted to get rid of." I said as I sat down across the counter from her.
"Yes I recall, you wanted my stock of worthless Fairys. Can I interest you in some that are at lest trained." the women said trying to change my mind.
"No. I rather train them my self. And they will lern, or I have a nice bit of fun befor they die." I said I could see some of the fairy who where close by recoil in fear.
"Yes I see your that kind of owner. Money." the woman said as she held out her hand.
"Payed in full. But not befor the good are seen." Azure said holding a stack of cash.
"It not many mostly fisty young ones, and a rare one." the woman said as he pulled a cage filled with Fairys from under her. She then tern around and pulled another cage from behind her.
This one was diffrent...
1231.title: Azure

12312.content:
She was happy and stood there looking at me with a smile.
"this one came in to my store asking to be made in to a slave." the old woman said as she huffed. "No fight in this one, can't train her, and she overly happy to boring for most clients."
"So I'm getting her for quiet less then." I said looking the woman down.
"don't toy with me, price is set and I hate people trying to haggle me." the woman said angered.
"No, no I was talking about the prices, now that I see the amout and stock. I can say this is a great deal. And I should come here to restock my fairys if need be, and tell others that your price are fair and stock is great." I said the woman cracked a smile.
"I say you have a silver tounge, you devil. All right I throw in a punishment case free." The woman said as he pulled a small case out from the counter. I stuck the case in my pocket and grabed the two cages. One holding cheap untrain fairys and the one fairy who look happy to be taken away. In fact the fairy was singing. I walked to a bus stop and took the bus for a fuw stop getting out and walking a block or two and standing in frount of......
12312.title: a Fairy that was happy

choices: let play with her a little
go and play with the other fairys for now.
123121.content:
I was standing in frount of a small house. It was nothing impressive just a place to live and sleep in. I walked inside and sat the cage with the fairy on the table in the dining room, I would deal with them latter. I took the fairy that was happy to my room it keep smiling and bobbing it head from side to side. Once inside his room he looked at her.
"Can you speak?" I asked.
"Yes, master." the fairy said as she smiled up at me.
"You seem happy. Don't you know what Im going to do to you?" I asked.
"It dosn't matter to me, I'll do as you say. even if it ment im to die." she said as she played with her body. "Do I make you happy?" She said as she tryed to show off her good points.
"Your interesting. What where you called befor you where a slave?" I asked as I pulled her out from the cage.
"I wasn't given a name. I left my vilage befor my nameing. I wanted to find a master that would give me a name." she said as she moaned being griped tightly.
"let see what to call you then?" I said as I placed her on the desk when I let go I expected her to try and flee or move away. Insted she just stood there smiling. "Faye. that seems like a plasent name." I said as I looked her over she was nice looking. nice furm ass, slender legs, small waist, good size breast, and her wings where a slight green color. all and all she was a good find. She could be sold for a rather large sum of mouny if she was trained, more if she was keep in good shape.
"I like it master, I hope to serve you in all your wishes." Faye said as she did a curtsy.
123121.title: a House

choices: In fact he wants you to CAPTURE creatures. Do you at least get a magic sword?
He needs herbs. He hands you a 'Elastoward'. Protects you from physical injury.
This is a test. Head upward and make magetools from natural materials to survive
1232.content:
"What all the way up there?"

You tried, really tried, to keep the petulance from your voice, but is was hard. Your Master, Oolanson the Mageforger, had made you do many dumb things over the last couple of years, but this was a little extreme!

"Can't I even use a flying carpet or something?"

"NO Thomas!" comes the sharp retort in his biting tone "Ach, ye young uns never 'preciate 'ot ya got do ya?"

At fifteen years old, you were a bit of a tearaway, with short, messy dark hair, a little lanky and maybe five foot five tall. You towered over your Master. The great Oolanson was stocky, rotund, but with a lot of strength for his size. People joked he was a dwarf, but that couldn't be true. No-one had heard from the dwarves in centuries since the Mage wars when Man had won mastery over the Leesi Heirarchy of creatures and demons.

You'd apprenticed with him to learn the noble art of Mageforging, putting arcane powers into everday items. Oolanson made horseless carriages, eternal lanterns, Animated brooms for cleaning, anything like that. So far you'd managed to make a match that lit itself when a word was spoken. Not a very good start!

Now he wanted you to go on yet another stupid search for ingredients up high in the mountains. You'd been to other towns, searched along the coast for Flinberries, even ventured into the caves for bat guano (EWWWWW!) but going up into the Leesi Mountains? There were still some wild monsters up there!
1232.title: Tomas Wainwright.

choices: After gathering supplies you head off.
A neighborhood girl wants to come with you. You've known her since childhood.
12322.content:
"Ey lad, ye cannae ge up there usin' bought trinkets! Nay, you be doing it rough! Aye, I'll gi' ya a little ward, but nay thing tae powefull!"

Sometimes it was really hard to understand Master Oolanson.

"Now, you be gettin' all the Bristlefern, Fillious Weed, Vimroot and Brockberries ye can, ye ken? Ta' this 'oldall to bring eet back. Dunnae miss none! I needs all I can!"

He hands you a tiny pouch covered in swirling symbols and whirls: the 'Holdall'. It's the size of an egg, but knowing your Master it probably can fit a horse inside there!

"An' dis should'a stop any there critters fra puttin' their mitts on ya. Ee's a 'El..as..to..ward' " He says, inunciating it carefully. "One o' me better 'uns that is! They hits ya, they bounce. Makes ye bouncy an' stretchy. Dunnae wear it oot bouncin' roun' the hills! And it dunnae stop heat, light, magic... just material stuff. Biting, thumpin'... ya know."

You nodded, realizing you weren't going to get out of this. You took the 'Elastoward' and carefully fitted the steel torc to your neck. These things of Oolanson had a certain key-press on their sides that released the catch. Without that this thing wasn't coming off! It was a solid steel ring with ornate markings (words of power likely), and thinner behind the neck, swelling to an inch wide at the front. You'd used a couple of his other protection torcs before. They were tricky to make, three interlocking curved sheets with magical locking, and that didn't include whatever protection spell was on it! They usually activated their spells whenever they were needed. In this case you guessed anything that would cause you harm, that stretching would avoid. Like he said, you could probably jump and 'bounce' up the hills, but the thing would likely run out of juice pretty quick and it'd take a day to recharge it from ambient Manna! Yeah, you were better at learning about how this stuff worked than actually making things!

With a sigh you turned back to the view out the Mageloft door out towards the hills. Yeah, you had a long trip ahead of you. I'd be a day before you reached the foot hills!
12322.title: Herbquest!

choices: During the night Fairies attempt to steal you Holdall! Damn pests!
You wake refreshed and head on to the Leesi Foothills
123221.content:
Road Bread, Jerky, Tensons, Tilly stalks. Food for the journey you had, and fairly nutritious. Oolanson always pushed the value of a balanced diet on you, even though you would happily live on steak and boiled sweets! Still, he'd pushed the need for roughage, vegetables and fruit as well as meat so you planned accordingly. He did seem to know what he was talking about most of the time... when you could understand him.

A couple of changes of shirts, shorts socks, and underwear were folded and tucked into a sleeve on the inside of the 'Holdall'. The food went in a separate sleeve on the inside, and tools for the journey in the last. What you gathered on the trip would be in the center of the Holdall, and you had no idea how much it could hold! Your Master had informed you that it could withstand most damage for a while, but wasn't invulnerable. Mostly it was vulnerable to cutting, though it was tough against even that. A very sharp knife or magic edged weapon would do it, simpler blades, claws etc would likely not. Other stuff it should hold up against, at least for this journey.

Finally, with a simple knife on your belt and a pocket full of your home-made self lighting matches... *sigh*... you headed up the path towards the foothills of the Leesi mountains. You'd probably get to the moors about midday tomorrow, and it'd be another few days (depending on weather) before you reached the mountains themselves. At least the territory nearby was relatively friendly.

On the way you stopped on occasion to practice your art. You made several more matches using twigs from high branches (had to be at least five feet off the ground) and some local moss and a lot of fine engraving with your scribe. Each one took maybe half an hour to make. Pitiful really! You also practiced your efforts at making Swell Stones, as well as Air Pellets. Swell stones were good for travelers. They were made from pumice and literally swelled up with water, acting more like a sponge than stone. Wring the water out and you had clean drinking water... Yours always exploded... *sigh* Air pellets were your favorite, a little pill of bark and chipped horn and feathers, pressed hard into a little disk. When swallowed they would let you levitate, though you still had to find away of drifting sideways... Yours just made you burp a lot.

Crossing the Lenly Dells you spied quite a few hamlets. Lenly it'self you recognized but others you didn't know. All were human settlements this far into the Kellun Lands at least, but you wanted to show you Master that you could fend for yourself so you skirted all signs of habitation and ended the day in a clearing in a small copse. The trees were sparse enough and little foliage this late in the year so you could see anyone approach, but it held some shade and if you were careful where you lay down you could break up your outline among the shadows.
123221.title: After gathering supplies you head off.

145.content: After all, you are something else entirely... Although, I must admit that I wonder whether what I see is in fact your true form.
145.title: Deceptive Appearances

info.brief_description: A world of magic where humans buy and sell fairies as both food and sex slaves. Yummy.
info.description:
Fairy Feast: Classic


          A world like, yet at the same time unlike, our own. A world of magic and wonder where fairies are numerous and treated like second-class citizens by the dominant humans. Here, a good portion of the world's economy is based on the buying and selling of fairies as everything from slaves and food to power sources and cheap labor. Fairies have no rights, but countless millennia of oppression have desensitized them to their plight, making the majority of them compliant and content, though not necessarily happy.

          In this story you will be able to choose whether to be a human master or a fairy -- one holds absolute power, the other is subject to their master's every whim. The ultimate dom or the ultimate sub. Which path will you choose?

          Some Ground Rules:

          1.) In the initial selection sections, always leave an "Other" option open for anyone with a fresh idea.

          2.) If you add any mythical creatures besides fairies to the story, they must be One: humanoid in shape (meaning no kitsune or purely animal mythical creatures unless you have them in an anthropomorphic form, and Two: subservient to or preyed upon by humans (because there are plenty of other stories with that kind of thing, and this story is dedicated to having humans at the top of the food chain). Example of what NOT to have: Illia, the mighty and ancient she-dragon laughed as she snatched up some of the puny, fleeing humans. Example of what you CAN have: Illia, the human-shaped dragoness, whimpered as her sneering master struck her deceptively soft hide with his whip.

          3.) Humans are dominant (related to Rule 2). The fairies, etc., can be rebellious or even defiant AS LONG AS THEY ARE EVENTUALLY PUNISHED FOR IT.

          4.) This is a work of fantasy catering to certain fetishes. It is neither a work of allegory nor a reflection on the character, sanity, or real-life beliefs of any of the participating writers.

          5.) Gratuitous anthro just for the sake of having anthro is strongly discouraged. A master cannot be randomly half monster/animal/whatever.

          5.5) Addendum to Rule 5: Hybrids of wildly different and/or incompatible species are forbidden unless it is indicated that the hybrid character is an anomaly and not the result of natural processes.

          6.) If you are going to add to the story, make sure that what you are adding is at least a paragraph long with good spelling, good grammar, and proper punctuation and capitalization.

          7.) Trolling (i.e., making intentionally bad or offensive posts for the sole purpose of causing chaos) is not allowed. The original poster (EvilFuzzy9) reserves the right to delete and/or replace any posts suspected to be trolling.

          8.) I (EvilFuzzy9) reserve the right to alter and/or add to the rules when convenient or necessary.
